column1:
4.2.4.1.4	 Electromagnetic stimulation
Electromagnetic stimulation (EMS) has been evaluated for its role in SUI therapy. In a double-blind RCT of EMS 
including 70 women with SUI, no effect of EMS over sham in any outcome was recorded [335].

Offer vaginal oestrogen therapy to postmenopausal women with stress urinary incontinence 
(SUI) and symptoms of vulvovaginal atrophy.

In women taking oral conjugated equine oestrogen as hormone replacement therapy (HRT) 
who develop or experience worsening SUI, discuss alternative HRT.
